welcomeScreen.title: Help yourself control impulses and gain hours in your day-to-day life
welcomeScreen.subtitle: Users have already saved more than 5000 hours by controlling their mobile phone usage

howMuchTime.title: How much time do you spend on your phone each day?

saveTimeScreen.firstText: Based on your daily usage, you spend...
saveTimeScreen.secondText: per year lost in front of the screen...
saveTimeScreen.thirdText: Think about what you could do with that time if you changed your habits today.
saveTimeScreen.fourthText: In a lifetime, that adds up to
saveTimeScreen.fifthText: Are you ready to make the most of your time?

impulseFunctionalities.title: The two features that will help you regain your time
impulseFunctionalities.blockAppsSubtitle: Schedule specific hours to block those apps that distract you, allowing you to focus on what really matters.
impulseFunctionalities.impulseModeSubtitle: Do you constantly feel tempted to check your apps for no reason? We'll help you control those impulses.

screenTimeAccess.title: Allow access to Screen Time
screenTimeAccess.infoOne: To block apps & websites, we need permission

permissionButton.title: Impulse wants to access Screen Time
permissionButton.message: Allowing Impulse to access Screen Time may enable it to see your activity data, restrict content, and limit the use of apps and websites.

deleteAlert.title: Confirmation
deleteAlert.message: Are you sure you want to delete the block period?

deleteAlert.title: Confirmation
deleteAlert.message: Are you sure you want to delete the limit?

impulseWelcomeScreen.title:
Impulse
Mode
impulseWelcomeScreen.firstText: Do you feel the constant urge to check your apps for no particular reason?
impulseWelcomeScreen.secondText: "87% of the time we open an app, it’s out of boredom"

thirdText.third: will activate each time you try to open an app you’ve set up, so you can decide whether to continue or not.

message.third: will be activated every time you try to enter an app that you have configured to decide whether you want to continue or not.
